alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Costilla County through 715 PM MDT... At 638 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Sanchez Reservoir, or 26 miles northeast of Questa. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Creeks and streams could run high in the area and water could pond on roads. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Costilla County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
